recipes.quick_steps: Grill chicken, glaze with teriyaki sauce.

recipes.quick_steps: Cook paneer in butter and cream tomato sauce.

recipes.quick_steps: Cook chicken with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

recipes.name: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.quick_steps: Boil shrimp with lemongrass, lime, and mushrooms.

recipes.name: Hot and Sour Soup
recipes.quick_steps: Boil tofu and mushrooms in hot and sour broth.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds boneless chicken breast or thighs
steps: In a large bowl, whisk together yogurt, lemon juice, ghee or oil, garam masala, cumin, smoked paprika (if using), salt, and pepper.
Add the chicken to the marinade and mix until coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
Remove the chicken from the marinade and thread onto skewers. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until cooked through.
In a large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Add onions and cook until softened, about 8 minutes.
Add garlic, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, tomato paste, and the cooked chicken to the saucepan. Stir to combine.
Simmer the sauce for 10-15 minutes, or until thickened. Garnish with cilantro.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: 1 pound boneless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips
steps: In a large bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, garlic, oregano, cumin, and cayenne pepper (if using). Add the chicken and mix until coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Remove the chicken from the marinade and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the onion and bell peppers to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Warm tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds.
Assemble the fajitas by placing cooked chicken and vegetables onto tortillas. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Pad Thai
recipes.steps: Stir-fry chicken and rehydrated noodles in a sweet and sour tamarind sauce. Garnish with crushed peanuts and lime.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.steps: Sauté mushrooms and onions. Toast the rice, deglaze with wine, and gradually add hot broth while stirring until creamy.

recipes.name: Spicy Tuna Roll
recipes.steps: Lay rice on nori, add tuna, spicy mayo, and avocado. Roll tightly and slice into pieces.

recipes.name: Dal Tadka
recipes.steps: Pressure cook lentils with turmeric. Prepare a tempering (tadka) of ghee, cumin, onions, and tomatoes. Mix and serve.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
recipes.steps: Marinate paneer and vegetables in yogurt and spices. Grill until charred. Cook in a spicy tomato-based gravy.

recipes.name: Pesto Genovese Pasta
recipes.steps: Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and cheese, slowly adding olive oil. Toss with freshly cooked pasta.
